dx-empty - BillService
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Index




Class BillService

public inherited sharing class BillService

Methods for dealing with bills

Change History

07/19/2021 Initial version.
09/09/2021 Calculates fixed fees amounts.
09/28/2021 Fixed fees amounts are calculated based on payments charged.
09/29/2021 Discount refunded payments from fixed fees amounts.
03/29/2023 Fees are now saved to field Service Fees.
06/15/2024 Calculate the service fees when they are included with the credit card fees.
update API version to 60. Add new comments style.
06/16/2024 calculateAgentsCommissions(), calculateAgentsCommissionsAsync(), CalculateAgentsCommissionsQueueable: New methods and queueable class to calculate the commissions for the agents assigned to the accounts of the bills.
06/21/2024 calculateAgentsCommissions(): The commission amount is now a negative value.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description

calculateAgentsCommissions(List<String> billIds)
Calculates the commissions for the agents assigned to the accounts of the bills
public static void
calculateAgentsCommissionsAsync(List<String> billIds)
Runs a queueable class to calculate the commissions for the agents assigned to the accounts of the bills
public class
CalculateAgentsCommissionsQueueable
Queueable class to calculate the commissions for the agents assigned to the accounts of the bills
public static void
refreshCalculations(List<String> billIds)
Refreshes the calculations (service fees, total tips for business, and optionally validate amounts) for a list of bills
public static void
refreshCalculations(List<String> billIds, Boolean refreshValidateAmounts)
Refreshes the calculations (service fees, total tips for business, and optionally validate amounts) for a list of bills

Methods

public static void calculateAgentsCommissions(List<String> billIds)

Calculates the commissions for the agents assigned to the accounts of the bills

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String>: bill Ids to calculate commissions for

public static void calculateAgentsCommissionsAsync(List<String> billIds)

Runs a queueable class to calculate the commissions for the agents assigned to the accounts of the bills

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String>: bill Ids to calculate commissions for

public static void refreshCalculations(List<String> billIds)

Refreshes the calculations (service fees, total tips for business, and optionally validate amounts) for a list of bills

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String>: bill Ids to refresh calculations for

public static void refreshCalculations(
  List<String> billIds,
  Boolean refreshValidateAmounts
)

Refreshes the calculations (service fees, total tips for business, and optionally validate amounts) for a list of bills

Parameters:
    billIds – List<String>: bill Ids to refresh calculations for
    refreshValidateAmounts – Boolean: if true fields ValidateSubtotal__c, ValidateTips__c and ValidateTax__c will be refreshed
